Articles.Content: make the eva suit parts ( kerbal, arms, legs, helmet or just kerbal, body and helmet ) separate pieces so they can be exchanged or supplemented with modders models and so we are set up for custom suits in the future.

ps: this is a suggestion that would be far down the line in priority, implement it after resources, most of career mode and all those important things

pps: yes i am too lazy to edit my op.
